Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Marina Way, which runs north and south through town.
Room.LongDescription: There is a large building to the east which appears to encompass an entire city block. There is a large, sparkling gem which appears to be hovering over the building. When radiated with the sun's rays, it gives off a purplish hue which covers the entire building and some of the street. Marina Way continues to the north and south. The Central Arena is to the south, past Rosecrest Street.
